titles.title: A bill to amend the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to remove the 7-percent interest rate limitation on certain Rural Electrification Administration loans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5369-5370)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

bill.summary: 5/6/1994--Introduced. Amends the Rural Electrification Act of 1936 to remove the maximum interest rate limit on certain Rural Electrification Administration loans.
